2056510.name: THE HUNTED: SHADOWS OF DESPAIR
2056510.description:
THE HUNTED: SHADOWS OF DESPAIR:
The shadows awaken in the very first chapter of the series to unveil hidden truths and mysteries.

Alex Walker our Paranormal Investigator and Psychic Medium will take you on a live investigation that he has taken on for a long missing persons case which has been left un explained and unsolved by Police Detectives for many years.

Explore the buildings, forests and grave yards to gather as much information as possible to solve the case. But be cautious not everything is as it seems.
2056510.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
